definition: to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond

sentences.english: Empty is the White Horse Temple tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今夜的白馬寺空空蕩蕩。

sentences.english: The airport was like a ghost town, the terminal was empty and eerily silent.
sentences.chinese: 機場像座鬼城，候機大樓空空蕩蕩，寂靜得可怕。

sentences.english: The place was empty as we left, silent as the grave.
sentences.chinese: 我們離開時，那地方空空蕩蕩，如墳墓一般寂靜無聲。

sentences.english: The ground floor has been erased, splinters of wood pointing the way the wall of water had gone.
sentences.chinese: 底層已經空空蕩蕩，木頭的碎片堆在水流的方向。

sentences.english: This afternoon, sunshine in my tranquil emptiness threads.
sentences.chinese: 這個下午，陽光在我安靜的空空蕩蕩中，穿針引線。

sentences.english: Its little shrine in the kitchenette seemed horribly empty.
sentences.chinese: 小廚房的一角空空蕩蕩，看上去有點兒可怕。

sentences.english: During those months the city is deserted.
sentences.chinese: 在這幾個月裏，城市空空蕩蕩的。
